title: DirectX error but its Up to date and so is my drivers?
body: Uhm so why is this random DirectX error coming up now? Its up to date and so is all my drivers I want to fkn play... someone help its after champion select i get the error

replies.body: I repaired my game and it worked for a good 10 games or so and is now just done it again after champion select please help!

Hey Flavos

When does the error come up?  When you try to log in or when you try to start a game?

If all your drivers, directx etc are up to date, One thing you could try is [repairing the game client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) - there are a few other potentially useful suggestions on that page.

If you're still having problems I'd definitely send a request to player support (via the "Support" link at the top of the page), as they'll be able to help you get to the bottom of the issue.

Cheers
Mindstar
